CMIP6 Data Request

MIP Data Specifications

Background Information

The Data Request defines technical metadata for diagnostics of the climate system to promote exchange of re-usable data. Details of the prcess and an overview of the resources available are provided in the web pages of the WGCM Infrastructure Panel.

Browse the CMIP6 Data Request

  • The data request can be browsed online;
  • It is also available as a python package dreqPy;

Support

  • For general enquiries: submit and issue here;
  • For specific questions about the CMIP6 data request, submit an issue here.
